title: Would you go back to the Stone Age if you could, and why? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’d consider it, because my knowledge of science and culture would help me live a stone age life in relative comfort and safety. Of course at first there would be language challenges. The danger is that my knowledge might offend powerful people such that they would convince my fellow citizens that I was some kind of sorcerer and needed to be killed.
